channel.title: 508 client help---Starting----PLEASE HELP ME!
channel.description:
Ok this is what my problem is:
When i run my server it runs fine but when i try to run my 508 client it will just stay on the (Connecting to update server) Loading text please help me it will not load all the way.... what is the problem with it do i need to download somthing to make the client work?? PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE [color=red]PLEASE[/color]
Help me with this problem thanks :D
